text:
Always enjoy shopping at The Central Point Mall, and Hush Puppies never disappoints!

They offer a wide selection of stylish handbags, wallets, belts, and shoes, both for men and women. They even have unisex socks and a great collection of waterproof boots.

The store carries a variety of sizes in shoes, with women’s sizes ranging from US 5 to US 9, and select designs available in sizes US 10/11.
For men, the shoes come in sizes US 7 to US 12 (depending on the style).

The staff were friendly and helpful.

Plus, they’re currently offering amazing festival sales up to 'Buy 2 extra 20% off, buy 3 extra 30% off, and buy 4 extra 40% off.'

Picked up some perfect Christmas gifts at a great price!

I recently went to Hush Puppies outlet at the Centrepoint and bought a pair of shoes for my husband as a Christmas gift, and he absolutely loved them! They are incredibly comfortable, made of leather, and waterproof—perfect for Singapore's rainy season. I highly recommend them!

Shady promotion! All products are on sale with buy 1 free 1 advertised. However the price is based on the original price. Always had a good impression of HP, but this is just intentionally deceiving customers

The most uncomfortable shoes , I got a pair of heels and they have given me painful shoe bites. The quality is also below expectations, I wore it once and the leather has come out already. Not at all worth the money !
The sales lady was super friendly and patient and very attentive. And she had a pretty good idea about all the shoes and sizes available in the store.
